channel.title: Contributing on AL Guidelines
channel.description: Recent content in Contributing on AL Guidelines

item.title: Title of the Guideline
item.description: This is a guideline, some parts are optional (if there’s no content, remove the whole paragraph). <Your name here in italics, plus your company name if you wish> Abstract Short, descriptive and easy to remember description of this pattern. Description In depth description on what this Pattern is all about basic components how the interact steps to implement considerations to take Good Example PutCodeblocksHere() Bad Example PutCodeblocksHere()

item.title: Title of the pattern
item.description: This is a guideline, some parts are optional (if there’s no content, remove the whole paragraph). <Your name here in italics, plus your company name if you wish> Abstract Short, descriptive and easy to remember description of this pattern. Context: Sets the stage where the pattern takes place. 1-2 sentences. Problem: What happens before this pattern is used? How can it go wrong? 1-5 lines. Description In depth description on what this Pattern is all about
